string.value:
A new hunting tournament will take place in #b#m260000000##k! Collect the Spirit Rocks the queen loves for a huge reward plus fame and fortune. 
As soon as the game starts, you'll receive 50 #t02270002#s and 5 #t02100067#s. #r#t02270002##k is used to capture the monster with little HP to acquire the Spirit Rock, and #r#t02100067##k is used to steal the competitors' Spirit Rocks.

 - #eTime Limit#n : 8 min
 - #eParticipants#n : 2 ~ 6
 - #eRewards#n : #b#i03010018# #t03010018##k
 (Receive from #p2101009# if the 
 score reaches over 200)

Emerge victorious from the Hunting Tournament to let everyone know of your combat prowess!
Achieve #r200 points#k to receive a special reward from #b#p2101009##k.
#eMission#n
 #r#jvic# #k W in #b#jtry# #k matches (Forfeit: #r#jgvup# #k) 
 #b#i03010018# #t03010018# #k #r #jhave# #k
 Record
 #b #jrank# #k RANK 


#eSummary#n 
A new hunting tournament will take place in #b#m260000000##k! Collect the Spirit Rocks the queen loves for a huge reward plus fame and fortune. 
As soon as the game starts, you'll receive 50 #t02270002#s and 5 #t02100067#s. #r#t02270002##k is used to capture the monster with little HP to acquire the Spirit Rock, and #r#t02100067##k is used to steal the competitors' Spirit Rocks.

I was able to show everyone in #m260000000# of my combat prowess through the Hunting Tournament.

 #b #jrank# #k RANK
